api.gbuild.component

Class GText

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.gbuild.GComponent
      • api.gbuild.component.GText
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GOption

    public class GText
extends GComponent
    Component defined by a text. This type of simple component draws at a specific location a text. Since Processing offers different functions to customize a text, these class includes properties for color, size, mode, and align.
    Author:
    David

        public void setAlign(int talign)

        Parameters:
